name: time_nanosleep
purpose: Delay for a number of seconds and nanoseconds

return.description:
Returns TRUE on success or FALSE on failure.If the delay was interrupted by a signal, an associative array will be
   returned with the components:
   
    
     
      seconds - number of seconds remaining in
      the delay
     
    
    
     
      nanoseconds - number of nanoseconds
      remaining in the delay

changelog.change: This function is now available on Windows platforms.
